basics.name: Adnan Khalid
basics.label: Consultant
basics.summary: Adnan hails from the suburbs of Long Island. He demonstrated a proclivity for obsessive perfectionism early in his childhood by being a video game completionist.  At 11, he built his first computer and his first website (a fansite dedicated to Dragonball Z). At 15, he was selected to be a teacher's assistant, often teaching students in grades higher than his own. He does not believe in 'specialization', per say, and prefers to see connections that span all disciplines which reflects strongly in his work. Although entering NYU with 44 credits from the 9 AP's he took in H.S., he ended up with over 200 credits as he double majored in Biochemistry and Physics (the hard science trifecta) as well as electives in subjects disparate as Gender Studies to Argumentation and Debate.

work.summary: Pretty Positron is a private management consulting firm for both Healthcare and Education based on a proprietary universal data analysis algorithm that has consistently fielded results that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of project managment optimization in dynamic environments.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

education.institution: New York University - College of Arts and Science

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
